title: How to unsubscribe from AUTOPAY
description: Canceling your AUTOPAY service depends on the specific loan or service you have with them. Since AUTOPAY offers auto loan refinance and new car loans, the cancellation process involves paying off the loan or refinancing it through another lender. Here's a general guide:

steps_1.title: General Instructions
steps_1.description:
* Review your loan agreement to understand the terms and conditions related to prepayment or cancellation.
* Contact AUTOPAY customer service to discuss your options for paying off the loan or refinancing.
* If paying off the loan, obtain the payoff amount and instructions for making the final payment.
* If refinancing, work with the new lender to finalize the refinance process, which will pay off your AUTOPAY loan.
* Once the loan is paid off or refinanced, confirm with AUTOPAY that your account is closed and automatic payments are stopped.
* Keep records of all communication and payment confirmations for your reference.

seo_text: Learn how to cancel your AUTOPAY auto loan or refinance. This guide provides steps on how to pay off your loan and stop automatic payments. Find out how to contact AUTOPAY customer service and understand your loan agreement.
